00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 #define LUSTRE_TRACEFILE_PRIVATE
00039 
00040 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00041 #include "tracefile.h"
00042 
00043 /* percents to share the total debug memory for each type */
00044 static unsigned int pages_factor[CFS_TCD_TYPE_MAX] = {
00045         80,  /* 80% pages for CFS_TCD_TYPE_PROC */
00046         10,  /* 10% pages for CFS_TCD_TYPE_SOFTIRQ */
00047         10   /* 10% pages for CFS_TCD_TYPE_IRQ */
00048 };
00049 
00050 char *cfs_trace_console_buffers[NR_CPUS][CFS_TCD_TYPE_MAX];
00051 
00052 static DECLARE_RWSEM(cfs_tracefile_sem);
00053 
00054 int cfs_tracefile_init_arch()
00055 {
00056         int    i;
00057         int    j;
00058         struct cfs_trace_cpu_data *tcd;
00059 
00060         /* initialize trace_data */
00061         memset(cfs_trace_data, 0, sizeof(cfs_trace_data));
00062         for (i = 0; i < CFS_TCD_TYPE_MAX; i++) {
00063                 cfs_trace_data[i] =
00064                         kmalloc(sizeof(union cfs_trace_data_union) *
00065                                 num_possible_cpus(), GFP_KERNEL);
00066                 if (cfs_trace_data[i] == NULL)
00067                         goto out;
00068 
00069         }
00070 
00071         /* arch related info initialized */
00072         cfs_tcd_for_each(tcd, i, j) {
00073                 spin_lock_init(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00074                 tcd->tcd_pages_factor = pages_factor[i];
00075                 tcd->tcd_type = i;
00076                 tcd->tcd_cpu = j;
00077         }
00078 
00079         for (i = 0; i < num_possible_cpus(); i++)
00080                 for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00081                         cfs_trace_console_buffers[i][j] =
00082                                 kmalloc(CFS_TRACE_CONSOLE_BUFFER_SIZE,
00083                                         GFP_KERNEL);
00084 
00085                         if (cfs_trace_console_buffers[i][j] == NULL)
00086                                 goto out;
00087                 }
00088 
00089         return 0;
00090 
00091 out:
00092         cfs_tracefile_fini_arch();
00093         printk(KERN_ERR "lnet: Not enough memory\n");
00094         return -ENOMEM;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void cfs_tracefile_fini_arch()
00098 {
00099         int    i;
00100         int    j;
00101 
00102         for (i = 0; i < num_possible_cpus(); i++)
00103                 for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00104                         if (cfs_trace_console_buffers[i][j] != NULL) {
00105                                 kfree(cfs_trace_console_buffers[i][j]);
00106                                 cfs_trace_console_buffers[i][j] = NULL;
00107                         }
00108 
00109         for (i = 0; cfs_trace_data[i] != NULL; i++) {
00110                 kfree(cfs_trace_data[i]);
00111                 cfs_trace_data[i] = NULL;
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 void cfs_tracefile_read_lock()
00116 {
00117         down_read(&cfs_tracefile_sem);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void cfs_tracefile_read_unlock()
00121 {
00122         up_read(&cfs_tracefile_sem);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void cfs_tracefile_write_lock()
00126 {
00127         down_write(&cfs_tracefile_sem);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void cfs_tracefile_write_unlock()
00131 {
00132         up_write(&cfs_tracefile_sem);
00133 }
00134 
00135 enum cfs_trace_buf_type cfs_trace_buf_idx_get()
00136 {
00137         if (in_irq())
00138                 return CFS_TCD_TYPE_IRQ;
00139         else if (in_softirq())
00140                 return CFS_TCD_TYPE_SOFTIRQ;
00141         else
00142                 return CFS_TCD_TYPE_PROC;
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * The walking argument indicates the locking comes from all tcd types
00147  * iterator and we must lock it and dissable local irqs to avoid deadlocks
00148  * with other interrupt locks that might be happening. See LU-1311
00149  * for details.
00150  */
00151 int cfs_trace_lock_tcd(struct cfs_trace_cpu_data *tcd, int walking)
00152 __acquires(&tcd->tcd_lock)
00153 {
00154         __LASSERT(tcd->tcd_type < CFS_TCD_TYPE_MAX);
00155         if (tcd->tcd_type == CFS_TCD_TYPE_IRQ)
00156                 spin_lock_irqsave(&tcd->tcd_lock, tcd->tcd_lock_flags);
00157         else if (tcd->tcd_type == CFS_TCD_TYPE_SOFTIRQ)
00158                 spin_lock_bh(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00159         else if (unlikely(walking))
00160                 spin_lock_irq(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00161         else
00162                 spin_lock(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00163         return 1;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void cfs_trace_unlock_tcd(struct cfs_trace_cpu_data *tcd, int walking)
00167 __releases(&tcd->tcd_lock)
00168 {
00169         __LASSERT(tcd->tcd_type < CFS_TCD_TYPE_MAX);
00170         if (tcd->tcd_type == CFS_TCD_TYPE_IRQ)
00171                 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&tcd->tcd_lock, tcd->tcd_lock_flags);
00172         else if (tcd->tcd_type == CFS_TCD_TYPE_SOFTIRQ)
00173                 spin_unlock_bh(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00174         else if (unlikely(walking))
00175                 spin_unlock_irq(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00176         else
00177                 spin_unlock(&tcd->tcd_lock);
00178 }
00179 
00180 int cfs_tcd_owns_tage(struct cfs_trace_cpu_data *tcd,
00181                       struct cfs_trace_page *tage)
00182 {
00183         /*
00184          * XXX nikita: do NOT call portals_debug_msg() (CDEBUG/ENTRY/EXIT)
00185          * from here: this will lead to infinite recursion.
00186          */
00187         return tcd->tcd_cpu == tage->cpu;
00188 }
00189 
00190 void
00191 cfs_set_ptldebug_header(struct ptldebug_header *header,
00192                         struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *msgdata,
00193                         unsigned long stack)
00194 {
00195         struct timeval tv;
00196 
00197         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00198 
00199         header->ph_subsys = msgdata->msg_subsys;
00200         header->ph_mask = msgdata->msg_mask;
00201         header->ph_cpu_id = smp_processor_id();
00202         header->ph_type = cfs_trace_buf_idx_get();
00203         header->ph_sec = (__u32)tv.tv_sec;
00204         header->ph_usec = tv.tv_usec;
00205         header->ph_stack = stack;
00206         header->ph_pid = current->pid;
00207         header->ph_line_num = msgdata->msg_line;
00208         header->ph_extern_pid = 0;
00209         return;
00210 }
00211 
00212 static char *
00213 dbghdr_to_err_string(struct ptldebug_header *hdr)
00214 {
00215         switch (hdr->ph_subsys) {
00216 
00217                 case S_LND:
00218                 case S_LNET:
00219                         return "LNetError";
00220                 default:
00221                         return "LustreError";
00222         }
00223 }
00224 
00225 static char *
00226 dbghdr_to_info_string(struct ptldebug_header *hdr)
00227 {
00228         switch (hdr->ph_subsys) {
00229 
00230                 case S_LND:
00231                 case S_LNET:
00232                         return "LNet";
00233                 default:
00234                         return "Lustre";
00235         }
00236 }
00237 
00238 void cfs_print_to_console(struct ptldebug_header *hdr, int mask,
00239                           const char *buf, int len, const char *file,
00240                           const char *fn)
00241 {
00242         char *prefix = "Lustre", *ptype = NULL;
00243 
00244         if ((mask & D_EMERG) != 0) {
00245                 prefix = dbghdr_to_err_string(hdr);
00246                 ptype = KERN_EMERG;
00247         } else if ((mask & D_ERROR) != 0) {
00248                 prefix = dbghdr_to_err_string(hdr);
00249                 ptype = KERN_ERR;
00250         } else if ((mask & D_WARNING) != 0) {
00251                 prefix = dbghdr_to_info_string(hdr);
00252                 ptype = KERN_WARNING;
00253         } else if ((mask & (D_CONSOLE | libcfs_printk)) != 0) {
00254                 prefix = dbghdr_to_info_string(hdr);
00255                 ptype = KERN_INFO;
00256         }
00257 
00258         if ((mask & D_CONSOLE) != 0) {
00259                 printk("%s%s: %.*s", ptype, prefix, len, buf);
00260         } else {
00261                 printk("%s%s: %d:%d:(%s:%d:%s()) %.*s", ptype, prefix,
00262                        hdr->ph_pid, hdr->ph_extern_pid, file, hdr->ph_line_num,
00263                        fn, len, buf);
00264         }
00265         return;
00266 }
00267 
00268 int cfs_trace_max_debug_mb(void)
00269 {
00270         int  total_mb = (totalram_pages >> (20 - PAGE_SHIFT));
00271 
00272         return MAX(512, (total_mb * 80)/100);
00273 }
